ygData.subject: Re: What should I do
ygData.msgSnippet: Pair thyself with a ranger fine wizard, you will no longer ever run aimlessly, but have to make the party hold for yee to regain mana.  Trust me, I will /tell
ygData.messageBody:
Pair thyself with a ranger fine wizard, you will no longer ever run aimlessly,
but have to make the party hold for yee to regain mana. Trust me, I will
/tell every ranger in a zone until I find one to join me, sometimes I won\'t
group with a party of 5, unless one is a ranger (or druid, that can track).
Once you realize what an important skill tracking is, you sall never want to be
without a trusty guide to help you avoid ambush, and take you right to the
desired enemy. They are especially usefull for the low level wizard in the
Toxullia forest, for it is hard to see there and the spawn rate is about 1
monster per day. The Ranger will keep you fighting until your arms can barely
carry that staff.

Zakrul The Traveler
Companion
Erudite Wizard
Bristlebane Server

-----------------------------------------------------
This mail sent through IMP: http://web.horde.org/imp/
